scenario.title: Test case -Accelerator
scenario.step: Given User on home pagejava.lang.NullPointerException: null value in entry: url=null
When User verifies Menu bar should not Move while pageload

Then User verifies left Header contains:
Header1 Logo Search Menu

Then User verifies right Header contains:
Header2 Account Country Call
